name: Beauty and peace of Vietnamese Village life
description:
Are you sick of smog and dust in city?
Do you want more air in spacious areas?
Do you want to visit Vietnamese Villages?

We are Black Tea, its our mission to introduce tourists a
countryside tour. In one day we will take you to Phu Dong Village, Gia
Lam District. Tourists can visit the paddy field, watch farmers
harvesting ripen rice,...
